Oscar D. Garrett


PLANT BIOLOGY | BIOENGINEERING | SCIENCE COMMUNICATION


I’m Oscar, a Plant Biology Ph.D. student at UC Davis. I research how we can use synthetic and computational biology to enhance plant immunity and forecast pathogen evolution before outbreaks occur.

title: Oscar D. Garrett
text: I’m Oscar, a Plant Biology Ph.D. student at the University of California, Davis. I conduct my research in Pamela Ronald’s lab, where I study how we can wield synthetic and computational biology to improve crops, with a particular emphasis on disease resistance.
